title: Roberts' Disjunction Example
description: Roberts' example of disjunction: 'P or Q'

source.author: Don D. Roberts
source.work: The Existential Graphs of Charles S. Peirce

notes: This example demonstrates how disjunction is represented in existential graphs using double cuts. The formula 'P or Q' is represented as '¬(¬P ∧ ¬Q)'.
